head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WHITE, MARY LOUISE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WHITE, MARY LOUISE

block.p: WHITE-Mary Louise. On May 9, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Thomas F. Loving aunt ot Ann P.and Matthew f. Raiten. Dear cousin of the Athing family. Cherished friend of the Reilly family. Visiting Thursday 2-5 and 7-9PM McLaughlin Funeral Home, Third Ave at 97 Street, Bklyn. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, 11AM St. Patrick's Church.
